nodes.bodyText: All the constants in ManagementConstants  are package-private  and serializer can not access them. Unless we want to change that and make them public. Thus I added it here  in serializer.
There are operations already grouped together a top, I would put that up there.
Where is the case with multiple numbers?
I noticed this and in other places, why do you use publishOn(scheduler)? It hasn't reached user code yet, so we don't need to perform work on their scheduler in the case that it is blocking.
